title: Ep125: Hedonism II, The Adult Playground
itunes:title: Ep125: Hedonism II, The Adult Playground
description:
The episode you’ve been waiting for! The infamous clothing-optional resort Hedonism 2 invited the WHOREible decisions podcast down to Jamaica for the weekend of a lifetime! Inside this episode you’ll hear the girls sit down and dive right into the craziest things they saw there, share there experiences... the good and the bad. There are also some clips included featuring other people who have been to the resort as well Big thanks to our sponsors this week, Download AUDIOMACK for free streaming and offline downloading of podcasts, mixtapes, and your fave songs! Visit BlueChew.com and use promocode: Whoreible and get YOUR FIRST SHIPMENT FREE! Just pay $5 shipping. Try it for FREE today! To book your stay at Hedonism 2 in Jamaica go to www.hedonism.com and use our affiliate code WHOREIBLE to show your support for the show! Want to travel with a group of like minded individuals? Check out SG3ent.com for information on the Sexy Grooves Tour hosted by Soni Groove Entertainment Follow the hosts on Twitter and IG! @fullcourtpumps @weezywtf Wanna listen to more from the clip featured at the end of this week's episode? Want to support the podcast? Become a Patron!! To receive 3 bonus episodes per month + merchandise and much more, become a patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecision

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
